mapper.insert: INSERT INTO Product (item_name, summary, sav_method, exp_period, rate, detail) VALUES (#{item_name}, #{summary}, #{sav_method}, #{exp_period}, #{rate}, #{detail})
mapper.select: SELECT p.id, p.item_name, p.summary, p.sav_method, p.rate, p.exp_period, p.detail, p.date FROM Product p WHERE p.id = #{id}
mapper.update: UPDATE Product SET item_name = #{item_name}, summary = #{summary}, sav_method = #{sav_method}, exp_period = #{exp_period}, rate = #{rate}, detail = #{detail} WHERE id = #{id}
